resolution.description: A numeric specifying the width inbasepairs of each pixel

zrange.description: A numeric vector of length 2 specifying the rangeof interaction scores to plot, where extreme values will be setto the max or min

norm.description: A character value specifying hic data normalization method,if giving

matrix.description: Character value indicating the type of matrix to output

chrom.description: A string representing the chromosome of region to be plotted

chromstart.description: An integer start position on chromosome to be plotted

chromend.description: An integer end position on chromosome to be plotted

altchrom.description: A string representing the alternate chromosome for off-diagonal plottingor interchromosomal plotting

altchromstart.description: An integer alternate chromosome start positionfor off-diagonal plotting or interchromosomal plotting

altchromend.description: An integer alternate chromosome end positionfor off-diagonal plotting or interchromosomal plotting

assembly.description: A string specifying the default genome assembly or a\link[plotgardener]{assembly} object

palette.description: A function describing the color palette to use forrepresenting scale of interaction scores

colorTrans.description: A string specifying how to scale Hi-C colors

half.description: A character value indicating which diagonal regions to plot

bg.description: A character value indicating background color

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying square Hi-C plot x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b" combinedwith a numeric value specifying square Hi-C plot y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying square Hi-C plot width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying square Hi-C plot height

just.description: The justification of square Hi-C plot relative toits (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only given asnumerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphics output should beproduced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters

quiet.description: A logical indicating whether or not to print messages
